products.name: KALAMKARI MASTERCLASS (ON DEMAND, PRE-RECORDED, SELF PACED)
products.description: An in-depth, self-paced online masterclass on Kalamkari art, perfect for diving into this intricate Indian art form at your own pace.

products.name: The Sacred Grove: Nurturing Blessings: Kalamkari Painting by Harinath.N
products.description: A vibrant Kalamkari painting capturing the sacred grove, a serene representation of nature and spirituality.

products.name: Tree of Life Kalamkari Painting by Siva Reddy
products.description: A captivating depiction of the Tree of Life, showcasing intricate details and the traditional Kalamkari style.

products.name: Tree of Life: Kalamkari painting by Harinath.N
products.description: A grand artwork representing the Tree of Life, highlighting the spiritual and cultural essence of Kalamkari.

products.name: A Woman At Door in Kalamkari by K. Lakshminarayanan
products.description: An evocative piece illustrating a woman at the door, rendered with exquisite detail in Kalamkari style.

products.name: Mata Saraswati Kalamkari Painting by Siva Reddy
products.description: A tribute to the goddess of wisdom, this painting captures the divine grace of Mata Saraswati in exquisite Kalamkari form.

products.name: Maa Saraswati Kalamkari Painting by Siva Reddy
products.description: Another beautiful portrayal of the goddess of knowledge, showcasing detailed and reverent artistry.

products.name: Krishna with Cows Kalamkari Painting by Siva Reddy
products.description: A joyful scene of Krishna alongside cows, depicted in lively colors and traditional Kalamkari technique.

products.name: Tree of Life: Kalamkari painting by Sudheer
products.description: An expansive version of the Tree of Life, abundant in detail and vibrancy, reflecting the richness of Kalamkari art.

products.name: Dancing Krishna With Cows : Kalamkari painting by Harinath.N
products.description: Dynamic portrayal of Krishna dancing with cows, a blend of movement and tradition captured on canvas.
